parameters.query:
INSERT INTO audit_logs (timestamp, execution_id, version, source, data_type, status, metrics, quality_score, anomaly_detected) VALUES 
('{{ $json.processing.processed_at }}', '{{ $json.execution_id }}', '{{ $json.version }}', '{{ $json.source }}', '{{ $json.data_type }}', 'processed', '{{ JSON.stringify($json.metrics) }}', {{ $json.validation.quality_score }}, {{ $json.anomaly_detection.is_anomaly }});

parameters.content:
## üè≠ Production Data Intelligence Orchestrator

**Features:**
- Real API integration (OpenWeather, NewsAPI, CoinDesk)

- Quality scoring & anomaly detection
- PostgreSQL logging
- Comprehensive HTML reports
- Slack notifications
- System health monitoring

**Status:** Production Ready ‚úÖ
